thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Jill Hamilton
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Jill Hamilton

author: Jill Hamilton
title: Jill Hamilton
text: You have not called me for my Visa information, nor have you responded to my query of whether I purchased the Gibney sauce ladle or if that other person, who had already put the item in his/her cart, got it first. So, without further information, I have no means of rating you (unlike the other silversmith I dealt with earlier this week).
